metadata.synopsis: One liner from a customer in Sorcerous Sundries

0.speaker: Shuna Huanje
0.text: Still here? I'll have you know my elbows are much sharper than yours - don't start a jostle you can't finish.

1.speaker: Shuna Huanje
1.text: Would you mind if I finished browsing before you muscle in, please? I was here first, actually.
1.context: NodeContext: Trying to be polite about hogging the shelves - TRYING
